title: Fix Download Database button visibility on Members page

requirements.summary: Fix the 'Download Database' button on the MembersPage so it is visible and accessible in the page header area, styled consistently, and triggers a CSV download of all member records with the required columns
acceptanceCriteria: The 'Download Database' button is visible on the Members page without any scrolling or interaction required to reveal it.
The button is positioned in the page header area, clearly associated with the members list.
Clicking the button downloads a CSV file containing all currently loaded member records.
The CSV file includes the columns: Membership Number, Name, Mobile No, Alternate Mobile, Address, Area, Spouse Name, Family Member Count.
The button is styled consistently with the rest of the app's design system (colors, typography, spacing).
The button remains visible and functional whether the members list is empty, loading, or populated.

file_operations.description: Review the current implementation of the page header and the Download Database button to identify visibility issues. Ensure the button is properly positioned in the header area with adequate spacing, z-index, and styling. Verify the CSV export function includes all required columns (Membership Number, Name, Mobile No, Alternate Mobile, Address, Area, Spouse Name, Family Member Count) and handles empty/optional fields correctly. Ensure the button uses consistent styling from the app's design system (matching primary color theme, border radius, shadows, and typography defined in tailwind.config.js). Test that the button remains visible and functional across all states: empty list, loading, and populated list.
